name: The Floor Is [Blank] (itch)
description:
The floor is...

  • ... safe
  • ... spikes
  • ... falling
  • ... lava
  • ... springy
  • ... sawblades
  • and many more!

The Floor is [Blank] is a challenging precision platformer for both veterans and newcomers to the genre. Take on hundreds of punishing levels while enjoying the following:

  • Tight and responsive inputs with full controller support
  • Built-in level timer
  • Gorgeous pixel graphics by PixelFrog
  • Cute sound effects
  • Vibrant soundtrack
Early Access Title

The Floor is [Blank] is currently in active development. Some of the content and features are not final.

More levels will be added progressively through the course of development.

Join us on Discord!

For a chance to playtest the new levels before anyone else, partake in exclusive giveaways, and hang around with the game's community, make sure to join our Discord server by clicking the invite link below:

dastmo Games Discord
